FuncDef: This command configures a BGP local autonomous system (AS) number. In addition to the global AS number configured for BGP using the autonomous-system command, a local AS number can be configured to support various AS number migration scenarios.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the virtual autonomous system number expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 4294967295.
Specifies the local-as is hidden in paths learned from the peering.
Specifies that the global-as is hidden in paths announced to the BGP peer.
